text: Pellitory may refer to: *Anacyclus pyrethrum or pellitory, a plant containing an oil once used for toothaches and facial neuralgia *Achillea ptarmica or European pellitory, bastard pellitory, or wild pellitory *Parietaria debilis *Parietaria officinalis or pellitory-of-the-wall *Parietaria judaica or spreading pellitory *Dalmatian pellitory, a pyrethrum plant of the genus Chrysanthemum
title: Pellitory
